name: Image Generator Base Pattern
description: Abstract base class for pluggable image generation with provider registry. Supports local models (SDXL, SD1.5), APIs (OpenAI, Replicate). Priority-based provider selection prefers local over API.
example_usage:
from library.components.patterns.image_generator_base import ImageGeneratorBase, ProviderRegistry
class MyGenerator(ImageGeneratorBase):
    provider = ImageProvider.CUSTOM
    def generate(self, prompt, output_path, config=None): ...
